# Repository

## Guidelines for repository setup

:::: {.columns}
::: {.column width="60%"}
- Generate as much as possible:
    - Documentation
    - This presentation
    - Test data
- Script everything:
    - Generate documentation
    - Run tests
    - Create package
- Automate as much as possible:
    - Harmonize code style
    - Perform static analyses
:::

::: {.column width="40%"}
```bash
adaptation_pathways$ tree -d -L 2 .
.
├── documentation
│   ├── develop
│   ├── _static
│   ├── _templates
│   ├── test
│   └── use
├── environment
│   └── cmake
├── presentation
│   └── 2023
└── source
    ├── notebook
    ├── package
    ├── script
    └── test
```
:::
::::


## Building targets

```bash
# Generate the documentation
ninja documentation

# Run the tests
ninja test

# Build the package
ninja package

# Build this presentation
ninja 2023.12.progress.presentation
```

Use of Ninja is optional -- use your favourite build tool


::: {.notes}
- Generate and view documentation
- Run the tests
- Build the package

All knowledge is captured in text files that are under version control.
:::
